rules.natural: If the research study created the climate model, then the scientific journal published the research study.
Whenever the bank issues the green bond, the company develops the sustainability metric.
Either the bank issued the green bond or the fund offered the carbon offset.
Under the condition that the fund offered the carbon offset, then should the foundation fund the research study, the research study creates the climate model.
Given that the industry adopted the sustainability metric, it is the case that if the foundation funded the research study, then the research study created the climate model.
If the scientific journal published the research study, then it is not the case that the company was approved for the carbon credit.
Provided that the company purchased the carbon credit, the company was not approved for the carbon credit.
Either the foundation funded the research study or the company invested in the carbon credit.
If the company invested in the carbon credit, then the company purchased the carbon credit.
Either the regulator rejected the carbon credit or, if the foundation funded the research study, the scientific journal published the research study.
Under the condition that the government created the protected forest, the regulator did not reject the carbon credit.
The government created the protected forest or the nonprofit certified the forest conservation.
Provided that the nonprofit certified the forest conservation, UNESCO designated the heritage site.
If UNESCO designated the heritage site, then it is not the case that the regulator rejected the carbon credit.
If it is not the case that the company developing the sustainability metric implies the industry adopted the sustainability metric, then the company appealed the regulator decision.

rules.prover9_expression: (-(-(developed(company, sustainability_metric) -> adopted(industry, sustainability_metric)) -> -appealed(company, regulator_decision)) -> settled(company, regulator))
rules.natural: In the event that it is not the case that the negation of the implication between the company developing the sustainability metric and the industry adopting it leads to the company not appealing the regulator decision, then the company settled with the regulator.

Provided that it is false that the non-implication of the company developing the sustainability metric resulting in the industry adopting it implies the company did not appeal the regulator decision, then the company did not settle with the regulator.
If the carbon credit is not valid, then the company was approved for the carbon credit.

steps.natural: Whenever the nonprofit certifies the forest conservation, the regulator does not reject the carbon credit.

Either the scientific journal published the research study or the company purchased the carbon credit.
It is not the case that the company was approved for the carbon credit.
Should it not be true that the company developing the sustainability metric leads to the industry adopting the sustainability metric, then the company did not appeal the regulator decision.
Assuming the company developed the sustainability metric, the industry adopted the sustainability metric.
If the company developed the sustainability metric, then in the event that the foundation funded the research study, the research study created the climate model.
Provided that the bank issued the green bond, it follows that if the foundation funded the research study, then the research study created the climate model.
In the event that the foundation funded the research study, the research study created the climate model.
Should the foundation fund the research study, the scientific journal publishes the research study.
Either the scientific journal published the research study or the company purchased the carbon credit.
It is not the case that the company was approved for the carbon credit.

(A10 → A2).natural: If the research study created the climate model, then the scientific journal published the research study.

(A11 → A13).natural: Whenever the bank issues the green bond, the company develops the sustainability metric.

(A14 → (A4 → A10)).natural: Given that the industry adopted the sustainability metric, it is the case that if the foundation funded the research study, then the research study created the climate model.

(A4 → A10).natural: In the event that the foundation funded the research study, the research study created the climate model.

(A4 → A2).natural: Should the foundation fund the research study, the scientific journal publishes the research study.

(A4 ∨ A5).natural: Either the foundation funded the research study or the company invested in the carbon credit.

(A5 → A3).natural: If the company invested in the carbon credit, then the company purchased the carbon credit.

(A6 ∨ (A4 → A2)).natural: Either the regulator rejected the carbon credit or, if the foundation funded the research study, the scientific journal published the research study.

(A7 → ¬A6).natural: Under the condition that the government created the protected forest, the regulator did not reject the carbon credit.
